articles.description: We test how the $399 iPhone SE and its single rear camera compares to the $699 iPhone 11 and its dual rear cameras. It's not as straightforward as it seems.
articles.content:
The iPhone SE and iPhone 11 have different camera hardware but both are powered by the A13 Bionic processor, making photos and videos sometimes quite similar.
Angela Lang/CNET
Despite widespread enthusiasm for Apple's $399 price tag for its new iPhone SE, t… [+8289 chars]

articles.author: Nick Statt
articles.title: How a Facebook bug broke major iOS apps from Spotify, Venmo, and DoorDash - The Verge
articles.description: A Facebook bug in the social network’s SDK caused major app crashes on Wednesday. Here’s how it happened and why it’s a big deal for app developers that rely on third-party services from major tech giants.
articles.content:
Facebooks near-ubiquitous SDK broke yesterday, taking major mobile apps with it
Illustration by William Joel / The Verge
Sometime around 6:30PM ET on May 6th, popular iOS apps from major companies like DoorDash, Spotify, TikTok, and Venmo suddenly starting … [+6175 chars]
